metadata.name: Ame of Orange Harvest, Sanaa Sunshine & The 7eventh Heaven Crew #1/10
metadata.description: A Planet Called Merkurii is a unique collection of NFTs from the mind of writer & illustrator J.M. Shabazz aka crowjones. Merkurii is multifaceted world, its inhabitants being all various anthropomorphic animals who inherit remarkable abilities from an all powerful being in order to escape the belly of a malevolent beast. The stories play with various genres including action adventure, comedy, fantasy, science fiction, martial arts, coming of age, social commentary, & spirituality. The goal is to see these characters & world come to life in various forms of media via books, video games, animation etc.
